ACCEPTABLE RISK
LOS ANGELES

About

Acceptable Risk LA is a Los Angeles-based artist collective established by former members of the FORUM mentorship program at the Torrance Art Museum. This cohort of artists, curators, and writers is focused on staging exhibitions and activities that challenge current ideas about art practices, collective models for art world engagement, and the contemporary art world at large. ARLAâ€™s work thus far has been nomadic, spread throughout LA and mirroring the sprawl of the city, but the group plans to eventually establish a centralized project space while continuing to produce pop-up events.

FORUM

The inaugural FORUM mentorship program at the Torrance Art Museum culminated in an exhibition organized by its members in the main gallery space.
